ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(OR( AND(ISPICKVAL(Membership_Type__c, 'A'), cpm__Amount__c=48), AND(ISPICKVAL(Membership_Type__c, 'E'), cpm__Amount__c=57), AND(ISPICKVAL(Membership_Type__c, 'F'), cpm__Amount__c=120), AND(ISPICKVAL(Membership_Type__c, 'R'), cpm__Amount__c=10), AND(ISPICKVAL(Membership_Type__c, 'V'), cpm__Amount__c=26), AND(ISPICKVAL(Membership_Type__c, 'F'), cpm__Amount__c=26), ISPICKVAL(Membership_Type__c, '') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage:
Amount must match the membership type:
A: £48 E: £57 F: £120 R: £10 V or F: £26
